New-York Historical Society
Susan Karp Manning collection of political photographs and ephemera
Manning, Susan Karp
PR 403
13 items items in 1 oversize folder.
1948-2008 Five photographs, one poster, one phonograph album, and six autographs of U.S. presidents (Truman, Nixon, Ford, Carter, Obama), politicians, and actors, assembled by Susan Karp Manning. For further details about this collection, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to printroom@nyhistory.org.
